name: White Climb
description:
A game made for the Black and White Game Jam #9 under the theme of "Death is a new Beginning"

This is the first time i've used Unity and only had about a week to learn it so the game isn't that quality.

You need to climb to the top to die in order to wake up from a dream. The lack of checkpoints might make this game quite difficult for the average player.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys = Movement, Space/Z/Left Click = Shoot

the sad thing is that this is probably the best game i've made so far.

[I am aware of a few animation errors but they are due unity's export system, also the audio is low quality for some reason]
